question: Will Juventus or Zenit St. Petersburg win their Champions League match on October 20th?
description:
If Juventus wins, the market will resolve to “Juventus.” 
If Zenit St. Petersburg wins, the market will resolve to “Zenit.” 

If the game is a tie or is not completed by November 20, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: (In-game Trading) Will the Suns beat the Nuggets by more than 6.5 points in their October 20th matchup?
description:
If the Suns win by over 6.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes.” 
If the Nuggets lose by less than 6.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 
If the game is not completed by November 20, 2021, the market will resolve 53-47 favoring “No.”
